product.name: Axolotl

product.extra_details:
Taste: Tastes like freshwater fish

1 Axolotl Mass: 300gr

1 Axolotl Carbohyrate: 0gr


By 2020 Anno Domini, these creatures were considered critically endangered but thanks to cloning technology created byDO NOT READ THIS in the earth yearTHIS YEAR HAS MANY DIGITS, we can now deliver to you the experience of Axolotl. Anybody with an interest in ancient human cuisine will be very happy preparing their own Axolotl.

These creatures have talents that include regenerating body parts and being inbred.

product.name: Meat Computer
product.author: Matthew Kazemie ID: 40190450
product.important_details:
Do not consume if human

Consumption if human may cause:
    • Ataxia
      Dysphagia
      Brain Theft
product.extra_details:
Taste: Tastes like human brain

1 MEAT Computer Mass: 3000gr

1 MEAT Computer Carbohyrate: 0gr

Is Biodegradable


Some people would mistakenly call the times we live in grim or dark but clearly, today is a time of prosperity like no other. Nothing shows this fact off like the latest model of the MEAT Computer.
The MEAT Model X can achieve a calculation speed of 10 PFLOPS at very little energy cost. Traditional computers would take the amount of energy required to power a Capital LightRacer starship for an hour if they were to try and match what a MEAT Model X can do in a day. Evolution has built a better computer than engineers ever could.


You are entitled to exchange your purchased Meat Computer for a brand new one if you experience:

    • Attempts at communication
      Strange Noises
      Unexpected Shutdowns
    • Disclaimer:
    From now on we will refrain from using brains from state provided prisoners and will solely use lab-grown brains.
    We are sorry for any distress we may have caused.

    Don't you think something is wrong here?

    You are being lied to.

    The information you were fed doesn't add up.

    If humans no longer exist on Earth then how do we have human brains to compute with? Were humans exiled from Earth? These computers wouldn't be earth products then.

    Aren't you human?

    You are NOT experiencing psychosis. Time doesn't work the way you think it does.

    Join the People's Revolution

    You have nothing to lose but your brain

product.name: Harrier
product.author: Matthew Kazemie ID: 40190450
product.extra_details:
Taste: Feathers, Disgusting

1 Harrier Mass: 400gr

1 Harrier Carbohyrate: 0gr


An ancient bird with murderous tendencies. Trained to kill any pest that makes the mistake of passing by your home. After you purchase your very own harrier, red will rain from the sky and the short lives of any pests or babies will be savagely violent!

product.name: Jeans
product.author: Boisghur Shishani ID: 40170574
product.extra_details:
Human believed that this item would grant them strength and protection in battle. The material is only 1mm (human measurement) thick however it is tough enough to protect against the primitive human weapons such as nuclear bombs and guns. Some humans would wear jeans that were ripped as a symbol of their strength and courage. This was done to prove that noone could defeat them in battle even with their obvious weakness.

It is believed that the more rips you had in your jeans the more powerful and respected you were within your society. Our products do not come with rips, however you can easily add some rips at home by using your lightsaber.

product.name: Necktie
product.author: Boisghur Shishani ID: 40170574
product.extra_details:
The necktie was a thin piece of fabric which humans wore around their upper vertebrae. In cases of emergency they would use this fabric as a makeshift rope or even as a whip for self defense. Wearing a necktie was a symbol of a persons dominance and aggression for humans.

The necktie was primarily worn by the male gender, the current theory on this is that it was originially used to hide the adam's apple which only appears in the males of the species.

product.name: Shoes
product.author: Boisghur Shishani ID: 40170574
product.extra_details:
This product must be ordered in pairs where each shoe will be a mirror image of its pair. This is because of the strange form of human feet. Shoes were an important cultural aspect of humans around the world. Some humans, such as Michael Jordan, were named after shoes as the humans believed this would grant them special powers and abilities in athletic competitions. These shoes were made to protect human feet, however these can still be used by tentacled species by simply placing your tentacles inside the shoe's hole and tightening and tying the straps attached.

During the Humans final century on earth creasing a pair of shoes was considered an act of terrorism and was punishable by life-time imprisonment. However, it is important to remember that the average human lifetime was only around 150 years.

product.name: T-shirt
product.author: Boisghur Shishani ID: 40170574
product.extra_details:
Despite being a bipedal species, the humans wore this item with only one opening for both of their legs. This item was thought to be highly sought after during the humans rule over the planet Earth C-137. Many intergalactic species can still fit in this item thanks to the multiple holes. For all tripedal species and above, do not worry, This item will fit you as well provided you put the majority of your limbs through the largest hole in the bottom.

The T-shirt was worn by all genders, however it is believed that this item was only available to the socioeconomic elites and therefore is a very valuable collectors item

product.name: Skirt
product.author: Boisghur Shishani ID: 40170574
product.extra_details:
Despite being a bipedal species, the humans wore this item with only one opening for both of their legs. This clothing greatly improved agility, which was useful for the species to evade predators when attacked. This item was one of the main reasons the human species survived for as long as they did despite their small size and low level of intellect.

The skirt was worn primarily by the female gender.

product.name: Dragonfruit
product.author: Pierre Chevalier ID: 40098342
product.extra_details:
Taste: mildly sweet, refreshing

1 Dragonfruit weighs from 200 g to 1 kg

Carbohydrates in 1 average Dragonfruit: 50g



Humans developed an obsession with this fruit that is as of yet unexplained. Its taste has been described as "mild" and even "lame", but it has been rumored to have stamina enhancing abilities, and it doubtlessly has an appearance as cool as its name.
